title: What is with all the remakes and afks recently?
body: I've had to remake around 4 to 5 games which is ridiculous and such a waste of time, that's almost an hour wasted on useless games because of stupid people that are afk. I would just play out the 4 v 5 instead of wasting peoples time like that, after enough games its just not worth it anymore. Especially for people who only have around 2-3 hours of free time.

replies.body: It's a bug in the new patch. I have great internet connection and FPS, but I was still disconnected from a game earlier this week with no way of getting back (no "Reconnect" button). I sent a ticket, and they mentioned a bug.
Happening with me too man, so fkn annoying
